title: Looking for this retro font
content:
Hi

I’ve been looking for this font for ages and I then came across it in a comic book! Sorry that i’ve included the whole page but couldn’t get just the panel I wanted. The particular font i’m looking for is the one in the third panel: “Carol Ferris”. It’s very retro looking and I was hoping someone might know what this font is called.

Also, does anyone know of any other 50’s or 60’s font’s or images?

Many thanks in advance

Cliff
author: cookie_boy2000

comments.content:
Hi Cliff,

I can´t see any sample or link. Could you please try posting/uploading it again?

:-)

for some reason I can’t copy/paste the image into this field.  
I can try and email it to you - could I have your email address pls?

thanks

Hi, You could upload the image to [http://imageshack.us/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109115101/http:/imageshack.us/) this is a free image hosting website (there is a file size limit I think but can’t remember how big) … no registration required or anything, then paste in the link if gives you into a reply here then people can have a nosey at it. Good luck!
I would choose to support [Flickr.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109115101/http:/www.flickr.com/). You can upload x-amount of images every month for free.

thanks for the info. It can now be seen at:  
 [http://img68.imageshack.us/img68/6253/carolferris6wo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109115101/http:/img68.imageshack.us/img68/6253/carolferris6wo.jpg)
